triples.name: Self-supervised learning
triples.relevance: CURL uses contrastive self-supervised learning to extract features from raw pixels without labels.

triples.name: Reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: CURL applies contrastive learning to the reinforcement learning domain for pixel-based control.

triples.name: Unsupervised learning
triples.relevance: CURL extracts features using unsupervised contrastive learning without labeled data.

triples.name: Deep reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: CURL combines deep learning representation learning with off-policy reinforcement learning control.

triples.name: Model-free (reinforcement learning)
triples.relevance: CURL uses model-free off-policy control algorithms to learn policies from extracted features.

triples.name: Feature extraction
triples.relevance: CURL's core contribution is extracting high-level features from raw pixel observations.

triples.name: Deep learning
triples.relevance: CURL uses deep neural networks for both feature extraction and policy learning.

triples.name: Atari 2600
triples.relevance: CURL is evaluated on Atari Games as a benchmark for pixel-based reinforcement learning.

triples.name: Feature learning
triples.relevance: CURL proposes a novel approach to automated feature learning from raw pixel observations using contrastive learning for reinforcement learning.
